verbs.description: [ARG0: rookies] [V: getting] [ARG1: opportunities for rockets] [ARGM-CAU: because of injuries suspension] the injuries to rockets starters james ennis iii and james harden following the two - game suspension of chris paul has helped force playing time to rookies gary clark and isaiah hartenstein that could help them develop coach mike d'antoni said but at 1 - 3 heading into friday game that was not the priority james ennis iii shanghai sharks houston gary clark tucker houston rockets clippers toyota center p j cp nba james harden rockets band chris paul rockets los angeles mike d'antoni isaiah hartenstein mike dantoni
